trans-unit.source: Represents a control that has an intrinsic value that does not span a range and can be represented as a string.
trans-unit.target: Representa um controlo que tem um valor intrínseco que não abrangem um intervalo e pode ser representado como uma cadeia.

trans-unit.source: This string may or may not be editable depending on the control and its settings.
trans-unit.target: Esta cadeia pode ou não estar editável, consoante o controlo e as respetivas definições.

trans-unit.source: Gets the cached [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o em cache [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] valores de propriedade para este <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Cached property values must have been previously requested using a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>.
trans-unit.target: Os valores de propriedade em cache devem ter sido anteriormente pedidos utilizando <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>

trans-unit.source: To get the value of a property at the current point in time, get the property by using <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern.Current%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter o valor de uma propriedade momento atual no tempo, obtenha a propriedade utilizando <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern.Current%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern.Current%2A>

trans-unit.source: For information on the properties available and their use, see <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern.ValuePatternInformation>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre as propriedades disponíveis e a sua utilização, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern.ValuePatternInformation>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern.ValuePatternInformation>

trans-unit.source: The cached property values.
trans-unit.target: Os valores de propriedade em cache.

trans-unit.source: The requested property is not in the cache.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade pedida não está na cache.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém atual [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] valores de propriedade para este <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This pattern must be from an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> with an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode> reference in order to get current values.
trans-unit.target: Este padrão tem de ser de um <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>com um <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode>referência para obter os valores atuais.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> was obtained using <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode>, it contains only cached data, and attempting to get the current value of any property raises an exception.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>foi obtido utilizando <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode>, contém apenas os dados em cache e tentar obter o valor atual de qualquer propriedade emite uma exceção.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern.Cached%2A> to get the cached value of a property that was previously specified using a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>.
trans-unit.target: Utilizar <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern.Cached%2A>para obter o valor em cache de uma propriedade que foi anteriormente especificado utilizando um <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern.Cached%2A>

trans-unit.source: For information on the properties available and their use, see <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern.ValuePatternInformation>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre as propriedades disponíveis e a sua utilização, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern.ValuePatternInformation>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern.ValuePatternInformation>

trans-unit.source: The current property values.
trans-unit.target: Os valores de propriedade atual.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern.ValuePatternInformation.IsReadOnly*> property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern.ValuePatternInformation.IsReadOnly*>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern.ValuePatternInformation.IsReadOnly*>

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
trans-unit.target: Este identificador é utilizado por aplicações de cliente de automatização de IU.

trans-unit.source: UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePatternIdentifiers>.
trans-unit.target: Fornecedores de automatização de IU devem utilizar o campo equivalente na <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePatternIdentifiers>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePatternIdentifiers>

trans-unit.source: A control should have its <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.IsEnabledProperty> set to `true` and its IsReadOnlyProperty set to `false` before a client attempts a call to <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern.SetValue%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Deve ter um controlo respetivo <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.IsEnabledProperty>definido como `true` e defina o respetivo IsReadOnlyProperty como `false` antes de um cliente tenta uma chamada para <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern.SetValue%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern.SetValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.IsEnabledProperty>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern"></xref> control pattern.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern"> </xref> padrão de controlo.

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
trans-unit.target: Este identificador é utilizado por aplicações de cliente de automatização de IU.

trans-unit.source: UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePatternIdentifiers>.
trans-unit.target: Fornecedores de automatização de IU devem utilizar o campo equivalente na <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePatternIdentifiers>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePatternIdentifiers>

trans-unit.source: The pattern identifier is passed to methods such as <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPattern%2A> to retrieve the control pattern of interest from the specified <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>.
trans-unit.target: O identificador de padrão é transmitido para métodos de como <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPattern%2A>obter o padrão de controlo de interesse do <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> especificado</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPattern%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of the control.
trans-unit.target: Define o valor do controlo.

trans-unit.source: Single-line edit controls support programmatic access to their contents through <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern>.
trans-unit.target: Controlos de edição de linha única suportam acesso programático para os respetivos conteúdos através de <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern>

trans-unit.source: However, multi-line edit controls do not support the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern>; instead they provide access to their content through the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern>control pattern.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, controlos de edição com várias linhas não suportam o <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern>; em vez disso, fornecem acesso ao seu conteúdo através de <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern>padrão de controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern>

trans-unit.source: Value to set.
trans-unit.target: Valor definido.

trans-unit.source: The UI Automation provider is responsible for converting the value to the appropriate data type.
trans-unit.target: O fornecedor de automatização de IU é responsável por converter o valor para o tipo de dados adequada.

trans-unit.source: The control is read-only.
trans-unit.target: O controlo é só de leitura.

trans-unit.source: The control is not enabled.
trans-unit.target: O controlo não está ativado.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern.ValuePatternInformation.Value*> property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern.ValuePatternInformation.Value*>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern.ValuePatternInformation.Value*>

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
trans-unit.target: Este identificador é utilizado por aplicações de cliente de automatização de IU.

trans-unit.source: UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePatternIdentifiers>.
trans-unit.target: Fornecedores de automatização de IU devem utilizar o campo equivalente na <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePatternIdentifiers>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePatternIdentifiers>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.
